title: Joe Kruse
text:
Joseph R. Kruse (September 9, 1914 – January 18, 2003) was an American professional <a href="basketball">basketball</a> and <a href="American%20football">football</a> player. He played for the Cincinnati Comellos in the <a href="National%20Basketball%20League%20%28United%20States%29">National Basketball League</a> during the 1937–38 season and averaged 3.3 points per game.
Kruse also played in the <a href="American%20Football%20League%20%281940%29">American Football League</a> for the <a href="Cincinnati%20Bengals%20%281937%E2%80%9341%29">Cincinnati Bengals</a> from 1937 through 1941. In he was named to the All-AFL Team in the 1941 season.
